full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal (RFP): National Harvest Survey Mailing Materials

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: 5000071069
* **Publication Date**: 2023-09-25
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-03T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-11-30
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-03-31

### Description of the Requirement

Environment and Climate Change Canada requires a contractor to produce mailing materials for the National Harvest Survey program. The scope of work can be found in the Statement of Work, Annex A to the bid solicitation.

### Category and Method of Procurement

* **Category of Procurement**: Goods and Services (SRV)
* **Method of Procurement**: Competitive, Open Bidding

### Product Service Codes (PSC)

* *44121500: Mailing supplies
* *44121506: Standard envelopes
* *55121605: Addressing or mailing labels
* *73151600: Packaging services
* *80141800: Mailing services
* *81151604: Land surveying

### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Environment and Climate Change Canada
* **Address**: 351 boul. Saint Joseph, Gatineau, QC K1A 0H3
* **Province**: Québec
* **Country**: Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Annie Emard
	+ Email: annie.emard@ec.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (819) 200-7216

### Document Attachments

* RFP documents: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20464/rfp-eng-5000071069.pdf
* DDP documents: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20464/ddp-fr-5000071069.pdf
